nintendo.name: Secret of Mana
nintendo.description: A well crafted RPG that features 3 player co-op.

nintendo.name: Super Mario World
nintendo.description: The original launch game.  Side scrolling perfection.

nintendo.name: Zombies Ate My Neighbors
nintendo.description: One of the most fun 2 player games ever.  Fight zombies.

nintendo.name: Super Bomberman
nintendo.description: 4 player game where you blow up your buddies.

nintendo.name: Rock N Roll Racing
nintendo.description: One of the best soundtracks in a game.  Racing style.

sega.name: Batman
sega.description: A surprising mix of play modes all of which are well done.

sega.name: Herzog Zwei
sega.description: A strategy game where you can control the battle.

sega.name: Hyperstone Heist
sega.description: Not quite as good as Turtles in Time but very close.

sega.name: Streets of Rage 2
sega.description: The best beat em up ever made.  Best of the trilogy.

sega.name: Warsong
sega.description: A hugely time consuming war strategy game. Tons of depth.
